Name: Passion Fruit Martini (simple)
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Wash and cut 2 fresh passion fruits in half.
SCOOP out the seeds and flesh from 3 of the passion fruit halves into your shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Float the remaining passion fruit half for garnish.
Review: Very fruity, slightly sweet, easy drinking and vodka-laced.
